segments.text: My cousin Monk . Have you seen her lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not for a couple of years . What happened to her ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nothing exactly . She's grown into a very attractive young lady .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , her long lovely blond hair and beautiful blue eyes really make her stand out from others .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not surprising . I bet she's very tall and slim .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yean . Around five feet five inches tall .
segments.speaker: S1
